channel.title: Delta?
channel.description:
ive been trying to play a delta rsps but i usually play pi , the java is all wierd and im unfamiliar with it, when i try to run it wont let me so i see what happens when i edit it and this is what pops , help?
TITLE Client @echo off cls
java -Xmx800M EGUI
pause

item.title: Delta?
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

heres a run server

@echo off title Ddsspeced java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

heres a compile

@echo off :menu title servername compiler @echo Compiling..... if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\InternetExplorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Compiling Finished. pause exit
